body:
We have two types of abilities, 1) those that are represented in the ability flags of a permanent and 2) those are modify the card definition. 

Only the first type can be modified by effects, the second type is fixed.

Make it possible to alter the second type of abilities dynamically as well.
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
